messages.title: Real Change for Charnwood
messages.content: On May 6th people will go to the polls. Gordon Brown's Labour Government has not led us effectively to recovery from the worst recession in over 70 years and the Conservatives are failing to make clear their solutions to the problems. No wonder people across Charnwood want a change.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Faire taxes that put money back in your pocket. Pay no tax on the first £10,000 you earn – cutting most tax bills by £700.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair chance for every child
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Smaller class sizes from more cash for schools and when feasible abolish university tuition fees.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair future: job creation to make Britain greener
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Investment in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.

keyPolicies.policyTitle: A fair deal for you from the politicians
keyPolicies.policyDescription: Making politicians accountable by giving you the right to sack corrupt MPs.

issues.education: We will provide a brighter future by investing in improving schools and taking real action on climate change and the environment.
issues.environment: We will provide a brighter future by investing in improving schools and taking real action on climate change and the environment.
issues.governance: A fair deal for you from the politicians. Making politicians accountable by giving you the right to sack corrupt MPs.
issues.health: Our fully costed plans will cut taxes for ordinary families and improve frontline NHS services and policing.

housing.content: Investment in public transport, renewable energy and energy efficient homes.

leaflet.personalStatement: Robin Webber-Jones, a graduate from Loughborough University, who has lived in Leicestershire for many years and now lives with his wife, Rosanne, in Ratby will help to bring about these changes.
